data.title: Barbara Hershey Movies and Shows
data.meta_description: Learn about Barbara Hershey on Apple TV. Browse shows and movies that feature Barbara Hershey including Black Swan, Insidious, and more.
data.text:
We Are Both

Regina continues to seek a way to regain her powers; David continues his quest to find Mary Margaret and Emma; the seven dwarves discover what happens when one of the townspeople tries to leave Storybrooke's city limits.

The Crocodile

Belle threatens to leave Mr. Gold if he doesn't change his ways; the dwarves try to find fairy dust in the Storybrooke mine; Rumplestiltskin tries to save his wife from a band of pirates.

Lady of the Lake

Emma and Mary Margaret, with Mulan, Aurora and Lancelotâs help, try to find a portal back to Storybrooke. Meanwhile, back in the fairytale land that was, on the eve of meeting Prince Charmingâs mother, King George poisons Snow White, and the only antidote lies within the waters of the Lady of the Lake.
